keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Asked in 2014 to share their experiences, female soldiers and veterans talked about serving where “a lot of respect slips through the cracks.”

headline.main: Women Describe Their Struggles With Gender Roles in Military
